title: 5: Fear and Loathing in Red Sox Nation
itunes:title: Fear and Loathing in Red Sox Nation
description: Boston Globe legend Mike Barnicle, NY Daily News columnist Mike Lupica, and AP White House correspondent Jonathan Lemire work through Joe’s issues with the Ghosts of Red Sox Past and Future as they commiserate over the Yankees’ weekend sweep of the Sox. The four discuss the final week of the baseball season and whether Boston will once again break their fans’ hearts.
itunes:author: The Joe Scarborough Podcast
dc:creator: The Joe Scarborough Podcast
